body: Traffic & Travel Tips        Brockway Mountain Drive features stunning views of the Keweenaw Peninsula and Lake Superior. "Creative Commons View from atop Brockway" by Nick Nolte is licensed under CC-BY-SA-2.5       From here you can access links to find out the latest information on weather and road conditions including road construction updates for Michigan's Upper Peninsula.      Michigan Department of State Police Winter Travel Advisory      Michigan Department of Transportation Construction Updates        NPS Photo  Parking Limited free street parking is available at the Calumet Visitor Center or at the parking lot on 4th Street. Additional metered parking is available in downtown Calumet. Click here for a map of the Calumet Unit.
